text: If I Can Dream is a 1968 song by Elvis Presley. It was taken from the 1968 Elvis comeback special. It went to number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in the United States, number 13 in Italy and Ireland, number 6 in Canada, number 2 in Australia, number 9 in New Zealand and number 7 in South Africa. The song was covered by Barry Manilow in 1990. That version went to number 81 in the United Kingdom. title: If I Can Dream
